su_description: Hello! I am Erwin Quinteros, a software developer with experience in both backend and frontend. Throughout my professional life, I have had the opportunity to work on a wide variety of projects, performing different tasks in each one. I have fulfilled roles as a developer as well as being in charge of some small projects that I have worked on with a team. My focus has always been to deliver high-quality products that not only meet technical requirements but also provide a good experience for the end user.
experience_p: What I have done so far
experience_1_point0: Design and creation of test cases based on product requirements.
experience_1_point1: I performed compatibility testing on different operating systems, regression testing after changes and updates.
experience_1_point2: I worked with documentation, creating bug reports that I shared with the team in each meeting.
experience_1_point3: Participation in meetings with developers, QA's, and clients to clarify requirements and expectations.
experience_2_point0: I participated in various projects using technologies like Node.js, PHP, Laravel, and React, where I integrated frontend and backend through the consumption of RESTful APIs. Additionally, I developed responsive layouts using frameworks like Bootstrap, Tailwind, and Vuetify.
experience_2_point1: I have also worked as QA, ensuring quality in different projects. Furthermore, I have guided new developers in the frontend area, helping them integrate and improve their skills.
experience_3_point0: I have been deepening my knowledge in React and led a project using React and Laravel. I was in charge of a project, where my duties included organizing the team's tasks, in addition to taking on roles as a developer, front-end, and QA.
project_title_p: Some projects I have worked on
description_project1: It is a platform where users can buy and enroll in courses offered in both online and in-person formats; the platform manages the entire process, from purchase to class participation.
description_project2: It is a platform for mountain activities, where users can rent equipment and make payments for skiing and snowboarding. It allows users to access and view services.
description_project3: It is an informative platform for the company selling cosmetic products, offering users the opportunity to work with them as resellers as well as purchase their products.
description_project4: It is an online platform that promotes interaction and a sense of community among people over 50 years old. Through this page, members can connect, share experiences, and participate in various activities.
description_project5: It is a platform designed to facilitate the registration and management of user data who wish to send or receive cash amounts or bank transfers in another country.
description_project6: IMOcert is a platform that provides inspection and quality certification services to producers, processors, and marketers in Latin America and the Caribbean.
contact_description: If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact me.
